summary: Completed testing of phone number and email validation requirements for orders and login. All backend API validation working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend forms properly show required fields with asterisks and enforce validation.
passed_tests: Admin login API with gsnadmin/gsnadmin credentials
Order creation API requires customer_email field (422 validation error when missing)
Order creation API requires customer_phone field (422 validation error when missing)
Order creation API succeeds when both email and phone provided (200 OK)
Customer login OTP API requires email field (422 validation error when missing)
Customer login OTP API requires whatsapp_number field (422 validation error when missing)
Customer login OTP API succeeds when both email and WhatsApp provided (200 OK)
Frontend customer login form shows Email Address * as required
Frontend customer login form shows WhatsApp Number * as required
Frontend customer login form has HTML required attributes on both fields
Frontend customer login form prevents submission without required fields
Frontend customer login form accepts valid email and WhatsApp number
Frontend customer login form successfully sends OTP when both fields filled
Frontend customer login form transitions to OTP entry step after successful submission

order_email_validation.details: Order creation API correctly returns 422 validation error when customer_email field is missing

order_phone_validation.details: Order creation API correctly returns 422 validation error when customer_phone field is missing

order_both_fields_success.details: Order creation API returns 200 OK when both customer_email and customer_phone are provided

customer_login_email_validation.details: Customer OTP API correctly returns 422 validation error when email field is missing

customer_login_whatsapp_validation.details: Customer OTP API correctly returns 422 validation error when whatsapp_number field is missing

customer_login_both_fields_success.details: Customer OTP API returns 200 OK when both email and whatsapp_number are provided

frontend_login_form_validation.details: Frontend login form shows asterisks (*) for required fields, has HTML required attributes, and enforces validation

frontend_login_form_integration.details: Frontend login form successfully integrates with backend API and transitions to OTP step when valid data submitted

validation_implementation.backend_pydantic_models: Using Pydantic models with required fields for email and whatsapp_number in OTPRequest model
validation_implementation.backend_order_validation: Order creation endpoint validates customer_email and customer_phone as required fields
validation_implementation.frontend_html_validation: Frontend forms use HTML required attributes and show asterisks (*) for required fields
validation_implementation.frontend_labels: Email Address * and WhatsApp Number * labels clearly indicate required fields

api_endpoints_tested./api/orders/create: POST - Validates customer_email and customer_phone as required
api_endpoints_tested./api/auth/customer/send-otp: POST - Validates email and whatsapp_number as required
